text: today's recipe is a very very easy
version of hollandaise sauce have you

probably not because you think it's too

really isn't hard at all why not try
making it at home this weekend for your

is classically paired with poached eggs
and poached eggs will come in another
lesson so today I'm just gonna cook up
some asparagus and show you how easy it
is to make on this the first thing that
you want to do is separate two eggs the
base of all hollandaise sauces is egg
yolk so I'm using two large egg yolks
save the whites for something else a
tablespoon of warm water now there's a

and I don't want to get into the

food comm tbsp of lemon juice today I'm

tablespoon exactly and then 3/4 of a
teaspoon of salt that's just for flavor
I don't think there's anything
technically scientific about that before

machine running
thing in a blender and mayonnaise is you

in the cup
classically hollandaise is made with

doing that sort of casually in my cup
here you see all that white stuff in the

and don't cut them into your sauce blend
up the rest look at that that is the
perfect hollandaise and then what you

it'll coat the spoon and leave a nice
